hero.title: Colors that inspire.
hero.subtitle: Designs that evolve.
hero.description: Discover unique color palettes based on your favorite Pokémon.
hero.paragraph: Pokepalette turns the essence of each Pokémon into a perfect color combination for your projects. Ideal for designers, developers, and design-savvy fans.

items.title: Real inspiration
items.text: We base each palette on real Pokémon, bringing life and personality to your design.

items.title: Easy to use
items.text: Pick a Pokémon and get a ready-to-copy or customizable palette.

items.title: Boosted creativity
items.text: Enhance your projects with unique, balanced, and memorable colors.

items.title: Multilanguage
items.text: Available in Spanish and English. You choose how to enjoy the experience.

palette.title: The perfect palette for your style
items: Choose a Pokémon and copy colors in seconds. Perfect for prototypes.
Adjust shades, save your combos, explore variations.
Discover random palettes to unlock new ideas.
Apply colors to a mini landing and see your style in action.

items.name: Squirtle
items.text: As a water type, I needed palettes that flowed. Pokepalette captured my blue and sandy tones. Everything flows now!

items.name: Umbreon
items.text: I wanted a dashboard with my dark and electric vibe. Pokepalette made it epic with my tones.

items.name: Sylveon
items.text: I used to color without direction, but Pokepalette brought me harmony. Now I combine soft tones like never before.

items.name: Infernape
items.text: My portfolio needed fire and power. Pokepalette blended red, black, and gold like a volcano.

steps.title: Choose a Pokémon
steps.description: Use the search bar to find your favorite.

steps.title: Generate palette
steps.description: We extract 6 key colors from its design.

steps.title: Experiment
steps.description: Preview your palette on a landing page and copy the codes.

feedback.title: Help us improve Pokepalette
feedback.description: Your feedback matters. What feature would you like to see? What would you improve in the design? Tell us your idea and help Pokepalette evolve like a true Pokémon.
